properties.title: Moldeo Director for Mac OSX Leopard

pkmkdoc.description: Moldeo Director is an opens source software interface for multimedia manipulation and interactive installations

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf540 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 \ \ \ Welcome to the first release of the Moldeo Director installer for Mac OSX Leopard.\ \ Please visit-us to www.moldeo.org and check our tutorials and demos.\ \ Have Fun!}
